free.util
Class ImageUtilities

java.lang.Object
  free.util.ImageUtilities

public class ImageUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

Various image related utilities.

Nested Class Summary
static class ImageUtilities.ImageLoadObserver
          This class is an implementation of ImageObserver which notifies a given lock when loading of the Image is done.

ImageUtilities

public ImageUtilities()
Method Detail

preload

public static int preload(java.awt.Image image)
                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Starts loading the given image, returns only when it's done loading. Note that it's much more efficient to preload a lot of images at once using the preload(Image []) method instead of this one.

Returns:
The result of the image loading, either COMPLETE, ERRORED or ABORTED.
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException
See Also:
preload(java.awt.Image [], int [])

preload

public static int[] preload(java.awt.Image[] images,
                            int[] results)
                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Starts loading the given images, returns only when all the images are done loading. If you just need to preload one Image, use the preload(Image) method instead.

Returns:
An array specifying the loading result of each image. Possible values are COMPLETE, ERRORED and ABORTED.
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException
See Also:
preload(Image)
